name: my-vue-vite-app
description:
Vue dashboard for internal operations.
Scope: manage orders, customer status, and audit events.
Audience: support and operations teams.
Entry points: authenticated web routes only.
Data sources: backend REST APIs and reporting endpoints.
UI rules: accessible components and keyboard navigation.
State model: server state plus minimal local UI state.
Error handling: clear user-safe messages and retry flows.
Performance: lazy loading for heavy report views.
Security: no secrets in client code, sanitize user inputs.
Testing: component behavior and critical interaction paths.
Build: deterministic output for CI and release pipelines.
Release notes: summarize visible user-facing changes.
Support model: include escalation owner for incidents.
Monitoring: track errors, latency, and failed requests.
Compatibility: keep Node and browser targets documented.
Docs: update runbooks when script behavior changes.
